description: Some comments add genuine value. Explain business rules and complex algorithms, warn of consequences or performance issues, add TODO for near-term work, and include required legal/license comments.

do.description: Write comments that add genuine value
content: Explain business rules and complex algorithms
Warn of consequences or performance issues
// Business Rule: Orders over $1000 require manager approval per policy 2024-05
// WARNING: This operation is O(n^2). Consider caching for large datasets.
// TODO: Refactor to use new payment API (ticket #1234, due: 2024-12-01)
// Copyright (c) 2024 Company Name. Licensed under MIT.
- Explain WHY, not WHAT (code shows what)
- TODO with context (who, when, why, ticket)

dont.description: Don't add attribution, change history, or obvious documentation
content: Don't add attribution or change history (use git)
Don't write extensive JavaDoc for obvious methods
// Changed by: John Doe, 2024-03-15 - Fixed bug
(code should be small enough to not need these)
- JavaDoc that just rephrases method name
